html:
taken from the ends of the earth…from the chief men. Israel was chosen from among all the earth, a nation of simple people selected from among the great and powerful of the world.

I have…not cast thee away. However greatly Israel may deserve to be cast away by the Lord as if they were impure metal, the Lord promises not to take such an action. Rather he will send them through a refiner's fire to purify them until they learn to obey him.
